result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kevin J. LEU

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
State moves to dismiss and read in this charge, defendant entered pleas in Case File 14 CF 246.  Motion granted.   
$50.00 cash bail applied to Case 14 CF 246.  
Minutes.

Settlement Conference Summary. Next Settlement Conference scheduled for 09-26-2014 @ 2:00 p.m.
Plea hearing is set for 10-02-2014 @ 11:00 a.m. BR-3.

Defendant's Demand for Discovery and Inspection.
Cover letter.

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 3 for further proceedings.  Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.  
ARRAIGNMENT 
Information filed.  Not guilty pleas.  Jury Calendar.   Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 08-19-14 at 4:00 p.m.  Plea date is set for 10-02-14 at 11:00 a.m.    State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.   
Minutes.
Waiver of preliminary hearing is reset to 07-17-14 at 1:25 p.m.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing and waives the statutory time period within which a preliminary hearing must be held.  Preliminary hearing is set for 07-14-14 at 3:30 p.m.  
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of bail jumping and possess drug paraphernalia.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 06-02-14 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $50.00 cash with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release, that he not be in possession of any drug paraphernalia and that he maintain absolute sobriety from drugs unless prescribed.   Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Probable Cause Statement and Judicial Determination.
Minutes.
